column5: Hi Everyone,  Can anyone recommend some good, informative fishing videos or video box sets?  I'm looking for a variety of videos covering different species....Bass, Pike, Pickeral, walleye (lol), Musky, panfish etc.  I bought Dave Mercer's videos from BPS and they are pretty good, especially for the price!  All suggestion are greatly appreciated!  Thanks. Hukd
you couldn't go wrong with he in-fisherman stuff
